source_note: Baseline from Tennessee Department of Environment & Conservation (TDEC) and city programs; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: Composting and yard waste diversion encouraged under TDEC guidance.
organics.bin: Green/yard waste cart or compost drop-off.
organics.notes: Some cities (e.g., Chattanooga, Knoxville) offer yard waste collection.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.

glass_containers.guidance: Glass bottles and jars only; rinse.
glass_containers.bin: Drop-off or separate glass bin if available.

metal_containers.guidance: Aluminum and steel/tin cans, empty and clean.

plastics.guidance: Bottles, jugs, and some tubs (#1â€“#2 common).

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeables/lead-acid at HHW sites or retailers.
household_batteries.notes: Keep out of trash and blue bins.

e_waste.guidance: Electronics recycling via county/city events and recyclers.

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule bulky pickup or deliver to drop-off/landfill.
provenance: Local solid waste program pages in TN
